channel.title: How to portforward server with hamachi
channel.description: How to portforward server with hamachi please help :) Becouse my friends cant login. They get error

item.title: How to portforward server with hamachi
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Hamachi doesnt need portforward, all u need to do it set up ur own group, then it will give u a ip, change ur client ip to the one it gave u then send ur freind link.

ur freind must also download and join ur group then he will be able to log in.

I use this for my beta, if u need help pm me and i can teamview u

Read full topic
item.source: How to portforward server with hamachi
